professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server 2012/2008 R2, disaster recovery planning, security management, performance tuning, and database configuration.

key_responsibilities: Administering SQL Server databases and ensuring optimal performance.
Implementing disaster recovery and backup strategies.
Managing security protocols to safeguard database assets.
Overseeing database maintenance and performance optimization.
Ensuring compliance with data security standards.
Providing IT support and network troubleshooting.
Assisting with system upgrades and security enhancements.
